page.title: 10 Osborne House Visit (2)
page.content:
5). Who did Queen Victoria buy the House from? {Lady Isabella Blatchwood 6). What is the House used for nowadays? {A Museum and a Convalescent { home for retired soldiers } 7). What did the children do in the day? { They were taught in the Swiss { Cottage by their governess who { lived there } 8). Did they go on family outings or holidays? { Yes, but mostly stayed around { the Estate fo safety }
At the end of our questions Mr Underwood took us around the House into some areas that normal visitors do not see.
